# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a section snapshot

- **init(_:)**: Creates a copy of the provided section snapshot.
- **snapshot(of:includingParent:)**: Creates a section snapshot that contains the child items of the specified parent item, optionally including the parent item.
- **append(_:to:)**: Adds the specified items as child items of the specified parent item in the section snapshot.
